## Understanding R sessions, the RStudio console and the script editor

You have already seen the pane-layout of RStudio:

![](gfx/rstudio_panels_functions.png)

To work efficiently with these panes, there a couple of simple concepts you need to understand:

**POINT 1** You can run more multiple _sessions_ of R at the same time, that are entirely insulated from each other.

![](gfx/multiple_R_sessions.gif)

The video clip above illustrates two R sessions running simultaneously on the same computer ... not in RStudio, but just in a simple console (also known as a terminal or command-line-interface).
